name: Stray Kids
description: A South Korean boy band formed by JYP Entertainment through the 2017 reality show of the same name.

name: Twice
description: A South Korean girl group formed by JYP Entertainment through the 2015 survival reality show Sixteen.

name: BlackPink
description: A South Korean girl group formed by YG Entertainment, consisting of members Jennie, Lisa, Jisoo and Rosé.

name: Dean Martin
description: An American singer, actor, comedian and film producer who was one of the most popular and enduring American entertainers of the mid-20th century.

name: ONE OK ROCK
description: A Japanese rock band formed in Tokyo, Japan in 2005.

name: Kids Tunez
description: A children's music group that produces educational songs for kids.

name: Dr. Jean
description: A Canadian musician known for creating fun and educational French language music for children.

name: icanrockyourworld
description: An independent artist who creates upbeat pop music with positive messages.

name: Patty Shukla
description: A Canadian kindie (kids' indie) musician who has been performing since 2004 and specializes in original English and Hindi songs for children.
